decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( 14-136-11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 22, 23 and 24 received on 5th September 2016. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - 4.	Prior to the use hereby approved commencing a Travel Plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The proposed use shall operate in accordance with the approved plan thereafter.

Condition : 5 - 5.	5.	Prior to the use hereby approved commencing and Operation Statement shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The proposed use shall operate in accordance with the approved plan thereafter unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - 6.	The living accommodation hereby approved shall only be occupied by a person or persons employed in connection with the D1 use hereby approved on the site, or a dependant of such a person(s) residing with him/her.
description: Change of the ground floor and one room of first floor of Bridge House to D1 use and change of use of 52.8m2 of first floor to C3 residential caretakers flat and addition of lift shaft and lobby extension.
